author: Ben Proctor

resources.description: File expected to change in October 2016
resources.name: Taxonomy of Herefordshire Indicators

organization.description:
This is the community datastore for Herefordshire. [Here is a post about what the datastore is and why you should care](http://h-map.org.uk/2016/05/06/what-is-the-herefordshire-datastore-and-why-should/).


Part of the [Brightspace Foundation Route Map project](http://h-map.org.uk/).

We blog over at the [Route Map blog](http://h-map.org.uk/category/all-posts/).

If you'd like to add data here, you'll need a datahub.io account. Then [contact the RouteMap project](http://h-map.org.uk/contact-us/).
organization.title: Herefordshire
organization.name: hdata

name: taxonomy-of-state-of-herefordshire-indicators
notes: The Brightspace Foundation has identified a range of indicators of sustainabile development based on extensive community consultation. These have been grouped into a hierarchy for convenience and also to allow tools that navigate through the indicators to be built. This file lists the current indicators and their relationships.
title: Taxonomy of State of Herefordshire indicators
